Html:
Hi!

I have converted from UTM 33V to WGS84 many times. Works great :) But, now I need to convert from WGS84 to UTM 33V.  Default for the UTM class is however 32V. 

So how to make this code convert to 33V? Changing the Zone and Band after the casting do not force a recalculation of the coordinates.

Geographic geo = new Geographic( (double)k.posLongitude, (double)k.posLatitude);
UTM nutm = (UTM)geo;
nutm.Zone = 33;                    
nutm.Band = "V";
k.posXkoordinat = nutm.East.ToString();
k.posYkoordinat = nutm.North.ToString();

-Leif Aksel
